agentUtterance.text: <speak>I think you're having problems <break time="20ms"/> starting a delivery <break time="20ms"/> on the Uber app. Is that correct?</speak>

differences.actualValue: <speak>I'm sorry to hear that you're having problems starting the delivery. First, check to make sure you're connected to the internet. Then, try restarting your device, and log out, and log back in. If that still doesn't work, try installing the latest version of the app. If you still can't start the delivery on your app, I recommend calling the customer, to get delivery instructions directly from them. Once you've delivered the order, call us back, and ask for an agent. They will make sure that you receive payment for your order.</speak><speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>

text: <speak>I'm sorry to hear that you're having problems starting the delivery. First, check to make sure you're connected to the internet. Then, try restarting your device, and log out, and log back in. If that still doesn't work, try installing the latest version of the app. If you still can't start the delivery on your app, I recommend calling the customer, to get delivery instructions directly from them. Once you've delivered the order, call us back, and ask for an agent. They will make sure that you receive payment for your order.</speak>
<speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>

agentUtterance.text:
<speak>I'm sorry to hear that you're having problems starting the delivery. First, check to make sure you're connected to the internet. Then, try restarting your device, and log out, and log back in. If that still doesn't work, try installing the latest version of the app. If you still can't start the delivery on your app, I recommend calling the customer, to get delivery instructions directly from them. Once you've delivered the order, call us back, and ask for an agent. They will make sure that you receive payment for your order.</speak>
<speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>
